title: Seeking T206 Wheat or Chance (yellow), PSA 4 to 5
author: Ericc22

posts.post_title: Seeking T206 Wheat or Chance (yellow), PSA 4 to 5
posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I am looking for a t206 of either Chance with the yellow background, or Z. Wheat. I am aiming for a PSA 4 or 5, or equivalent for Chance. Might consider up to a PSA 6 for Wheat. If you have one for sale, please let me know.

Thank you!

Eric

Hi Eric,
If you're willing to consider an SGC graded card, I have this SGC 50 that I could sell for $215 (includes shipping and paypal fees).

[IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-YDMZJouUBXc/TkigVQsZbxI/AAAAAAAANwg/PNMbpfVL4RQ/s640/T206%252520Wheat%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-4-W6DlfJsJc/TkigVtQEA5I/AAAAAAAANwo/qpca1i2igTU/s640/T206%252520Wheat%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Hope that helps,
--S

Bruce, thank you for the trade and please confirm for me that yours arrived safely.

Rob, thank you for the cards - they are received and I am happy to have them in their new home!

And thanks to everyone for the offers.

Fun stuff, and great community.

Eric
